note.p: Death: His house in Bedford Square, London (22 October 1811)
Burial: St James's cemetery, Hampstead Road, London
Education: Lincoln College, Oxford; Trinity College, Cambridge; Edinburgh; MB (1768) MD (1783) Cambridge;
Career: Physician, Middlesex Hospital (1773-1777); Physician St Thomas' Hospital (1777-1783); Physician in ordinary to George III (from 1806)
Memberships: Medical Society of Edinburgh; FCP (1774)
